metadata.title: CVE-2020-13357 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Gitlab CE/EE versions >= 13.1 to <13.4.7, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >= 13.6 to <13.6.2 allowed an unauthorized user toaccess the user list corresponding to a feature flag in a project.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
